title: Double Bind
description: Detective Yamashiro teams up with psychiatrist Dr. Toko Asamiya to solve crimes by the most disturbed perpetrators.
quote: There is no way illusions can come to life.
altHero: male detective, Yamashiro, and female psychiatrist, Dr. Asamiya
alt1: Yamashiro and Dr. Asamiya with a young woman, Yoko
alt3: a man talking to Yoko on the street
alt4: Yoko facing away from Dr. Asamiya, both standing in the rain
